      • withChannelListeners

        public LyraOptions withChannelListeners(ChannelListener... channelListeners)
        Sets the channelListeners to call on channel related events.

      • withChannelRecoveryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withChannelRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the RetryPolicy to use for the recovery of each Channel after an unexpected Connection/Channel closure. Overrides the global recovery policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withChannelRetryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withChannelRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling Channel invocation errors. Overrides the global retry policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withConnectionListeners

        public LyraOptions withConnectionListeners(ConnectionListener... connectionListeners)
        Sets the connectionListeners to call on connection related events.

      • withConnectionRecoveryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withConnectionRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the RetryPolicy to use for the recovery of Connections after an unexpected Connection closure. Overrides the global recovery policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withConnectionRetryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withConnectionRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling Connection invocation errors. Overrides the global retry policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withConnectionTimeout

        public LyraOptions withConnectionTimeout(Duration connectionTimeout)
        Set the connection timeout, zero for infinite, for an individual connection attempt. Overrides the global recovery policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if connectionTimeout is null

      • withConnectRetryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withConnectRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the RetryPolicy to use for handling connection attempt errors. Overrides the global retry policy.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withConsumerListeners

        public LyraOptions withConsumerListeners(ConsumerListener... consumerListeners)
        Sets the consumerListeners to call on consumer related events.

      • withConsumerThreadPool

        public LyraOptions withConsumerThreadPool(ExecutorService consumerThreadPool)
        Sets the thread pool for threads on which consumers will be called. The consumerThreadPool will not be shutdown when a connection is closed.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if consumerThreadPool is null

      • withName

        public LyraOptions withName(String name)
        Sets the connection name. Used for logging and consumer thread naming.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null

      • withPassword

        public LyraOptions withPassword(String password)
        Sets the password.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if password is null

      • withPort

        public LyraOptions withPort(int port)
        Set the port.

      • withPrefetchCount

        public LyraOptions withPrefetchCount(int prefetchCount)
        Sets the prefetch count for all channels on the connection.

      • withRecoveryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the global RetryPolicy for the recovery of Connections/Channels/Consumers after an unexpected Connection/Channel closure. Can be overridden with specific policies via withConnectionRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy), withChannelRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy), and #withConsumerRecoveryPolicy(RetryPolicy).

      • withRequestedHeartbeat

        public LyraOptions withRequestedHeartbeat(Duration requestedHeartbeat)
        Set the requested heartbeat, zero for none.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if requestedHeartbeat is null

      • withRetryPolicy

        public LyraOptions withRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Sets the global RetryPolicy to use for handling connection attempt, Connection invocation, and Channel invocation errors. Can be overridden with specific policies via withConnectRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy), withConnectionRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy), and withChannelRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy).
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if retryPolicy is null

      • withUsername

        public LyraOptions withUsername(String username)
        Sets the username.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if username is null

      • withVirtualHost

        public LyraOptions withVirtualHost(String virtualHost)
        Sets the virtual host.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if virtualHost is null

      • forAddress

        public static LyraOptions forAddress(String addresses)
        Sets the addresses to connect to. Addresses will be attempted in order.
        Parameters:
        addresses - formatted as "host1[:port],host2[:port]", etc.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if addresses is null
        IllegalStateException - if host or addresses have already been set

      • forAddresses

        public static LyraOptions forAddresses(com.rabbitmq.client.Address... addresses)
        Sets the addresses to connect to. Addresses will be attempted in order.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if addresses is null
        IllegalStateException - if host or address has already been set

      • forHost

        public static LyraOptions forHost(String host)
        Sets the host to connect to.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if host is null
